name: Boat Stretch
description:
You try to beat your highscore and unlock new skins for your boat!

  • This is first game I ever finished and released, hope you like it atleast a little bit! It's made for mobile and will be soon on google play store too!
  • I will continue working on this game project and adding more gameplay features and progression like skins!
  • Leaderboards dont work in html5 because its using google play API (I will try to work more on pc version of this game too too). 
  • All art was drawn on paper and music is custom made. What do you think about the game? 😊
  • Thanks for playing so much!
